name: Asteroids (itch) (Loftus)
description:
Features:

  • Control a spaceship and destroy asteroids without crashing to achieve the highest score possible!
  • Unlimited level progression making for a true arcade experience
  • Randomised asteroid locations, speed and trajectory to make for a different challenge on every playthrough
  • UFOs that can appear and attempt to shoot the player. Shoot these down for bonus points!
  • Space-themed music and sound effects

Controls:

  • Movement - WASD or Arrow Keys
  • Shooting - Spacebar
